page.title: 16BEKESBOURNE RAILWAY STATION
page.content: The railway runs through Bekesbourne. There is a foot bridge across the railway. The station has no people working there but people catch trains there. It is going to be repainted, even though no one works there. We looked at the time table and found that Monday to Friday 23 trains go to London and 23 trains go to Dover. On Saturdays 18 trains go to London and 20 trains go to Dover.On Sundays 17 trains go to London and 19 trains go to Dover.The first train to London leaves Bekesbourne at 6.22 and the last train leaves at 22.38. The first train to Dover leaves at 6.39 and the last train leaves at 23.48.We saw a train going to London at 12.38 and a train going to Dover at 12.45. We found out that 53 relatives of children at Bridge School use the station at Bekesbourne.
